name: iTunes
description: This uses 32bit iTunes version 12.9.3.3, as later versions break the GUI, and the 64bit installers fail to launch.
notes:
Do not update iTunes, disable automatic updates during install and when prompted after launch. Untick "Launch iTunes" when the installer is done.

iTunes may crash when signing in/authorizing your computer/using 2FA. Re-open iTunes and try again, it should work the second time.

iTunes may become unresponsive while downloading media, wait until it is finished.
content:
files:
- installer: https://secure-appldnld.apple.com/itunes12/041-31290-20190124-BBE902D6-D788-11E8-B555-8E91F34A5CAA/iTunesSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/iTunes/iTunes.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: gdiplus tahoma
    description: Installing dependencies...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing iTunes...
    exclude_processes: iTunesHelper.exe iPodService.exe
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
